Posts.Content: Good Afternoon to All: update regarding the burning in my left breast...woke up this morning with burning now in the right one as well...mammogram scheduled for tomorrow...hopefully someone will be able to explain to me what's going on here...Will keep in touch with you here on my progress. Thanks again for listening.
Posts.Title: Burning sensation and pain in left breast

Posts.Content:
Hi to everyone. I'm new to this forum so forgive me if I ramble a little.
I too am experiencing burning in my left breast for maybe a week or so and it's getting progressively worst. I went in to see my primary care physicians for a fever I woke with on Monday this week and told him about
 the burning I'm having in my breast. He had the gynecologist examine me and she said its probably a pulled muscle. I scheduled my annual mammogram which I've have been putting off for months...now I have to go. I did tell the scheduler that I'm experiencing burning in my left breast so she made a note in the system. Hopefully I'll get to the bottom of this one way or the other.
I think with lots of prayers asking for guidance and direction I'll be alright.
Thanks for listening:)
Posts.Title: Burning sensation and pain in left breast

Posts.Content: Thank you for your response to my thread....luvtherockymtns.
Posts.Title: Burning sensation and pain in left breast

Posts.Content: No...I had ultrasound done and it didn't show anything...burning has subsided tho...I'm not really sure where it came from...still a mystery. Thanks 4 asking Angela.
